hero.title: Your Health, Our Priority
hero.subtitle: Experience personalized pharmacy care with our team of dedicated pharmacists. We're here to help you live healthier.

services.title: Prescription Refills
services.description: Quick and easy prescription refills. Submit online, call us, or use our mobile-friendly system — your medication will be ready when you arrive.

services.title: Transfer Prescriptions
services.description: Switching pharmacies? We handle everything — just give us your information and we'll take care of the rest.

services.title: Immunizations & Vaccines
services.description: Stay protected with our comprehensive vaccination services. Walk-ins welcome for flu shots, COVID-19, shingles, and more.

services.title: Free Delivery
services.description: Can't make it to the pharmacy? We offer free prescription delivery to your home or office within our service area.

whyChooseUs.title: Personalized Care
whyChooseUs.description: We take the time to understand your unique health needs and provide tailored solutions that work for you.

whyChooseUs.title: Medication Savings
whyChooseUs.description: Our pharmacists help you find the best prices and coordinate your benefits to maximize savings.

whyChooseUs.title: Fast & Convenient
whyChooseUs.description: Multiple ways to refill — online, by phone, or in person. Plus free delivery right to your door.

whyChooseUs.title: Expert Guidance
whyChooseUs.description: Our knowledgeable pharmacists are always available to answer questions and provide medication counseling.

testimonials.name: Maria S.
testimonials.text: The pharmacists here truly care about their customers. They took the time to explain my medications and even helped me find a more affordable option.

testimonials.name: James T.
testimonials.text: I switched from a big chain pharmacy and the difference is night and day. Free delivery, no long waits, and they actually know my name.

testimonials.name: Linda M.
testimonials.text: The pill packaging service has been a lifesaver for my elderly mother. Everything is organized by day and time — no more confusion.

testimonials.name: Robert K.
testimonials.text: After my surgery, the team helped coordinate all my new medications and even called to check on me. You don't get that from big chains.

testimonials.name: Susan W.
testimonials.text: They saved me over $200 a month by finding generic alternatives and manufacturer coupons. The pharmacist reviewed all my medications.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Experience Better Pharmacy Care?
ctaSection.description: Join the River Park Pharmacy family today. Transfer your prescriptions and discover the difference personalized care makes.
